# [Interview #1115: Firefight Tour - El Cerrito, CA, Entry #42](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1115#42)

#### Question

I’m concerned that that bloodthirsty sword is off on his own again

#### Brandon Sanderson

He, ah, he is, he is in dangerous hands right now, let’s just say that

#### Question

Yeah, untrustworthy hands.

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes, yes he is.
